column41: x1 gets/procures/acquires/obtains/accepts x2 from source x3 [previous possessor not implied] ||| [also fetch; accept a gift (= seldu'acpa)]; (cf. punji, lebna, vimcu)

column2:
'''cpana''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is on top of  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  ...
:'''lo cpana''' — what is on top. '''lo se cpana''' — what is below. 
:'''i su'o bisli cu se cpana lo cmana''' — ''There is ice on top of the mountain.''
:Comment: @@@to lay upon@@@ is {punji}.
:Related words: {se} {vasru}, {jbini}, {zvati}, {nenri}, {vreta}, {ckana}, {diklo}, {jibni}, {lamji}, {zutse}, {punji}, {sarji}, {zbepi}
column7: x1 sepcau zvati lo to na'o galraipau toi sefta be x2
column25: @@@to lay upon@@@ is {punji}.
column41: x1 is upon/atop/resting on/lying on [the upper surface of] x2 in frame of reference/gravity x3 ||| (x1 may be object or event); (cf. se vasru, jbini, zvati, nenri, vreta, ckana, diklo, jibni, lamji, zutse, punji for lay upon, sarji, zbepi)

column7: x1 muvdu fau lo nu lo xadni cu lamji ja jibni x2 kei fe x3 se pi'o x4 noi tuple ja birka
column41: x1 climbs/clambers/creeps/crawls on surface x2 in direction x3 using x4 [limbs/tools] ||| (cf. klama, litru, bajra, farlu, plipe)

column2:
'''cpedu''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  requests or asks for  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(clause, property of x3)</sub>''  from  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  ...
:'''lo se cpedu''' — something requested. 
:'''i le nanmu pu cpedu lo ka jai gau kalri fai le vorme vau mi ta'i lo ka jai gau muvdu fai lo xance''' — ''The man asked me to open the door by moving his hand.''
:Comment: a request may be indicated in speech, in writing, or by an action (e.g. petitions are often in writing, while begging/panhandling may be indicated by an action or even demeanor).
:Related words: {cusku}, {pikci}, {retsku}, {se} {spuda}, {danfu}
column7: x1 jungau x3 lo du'u x1 djica lo ka cpacu x2 x3
column25: a request may be indicated in speech, in writing, or by an action (e.g. petitions are often in writing, while begging/panhandling may be indicated by an action or even demeanor).
column41: x1 requests/asks/petitions/solicits for x2 of/from x3 in manner/form x4 ||| [also demand (= mi'ecpe); x4 is a means of expression (cf. ve cusku): a request may be indicated in speech, in writing, or by an action (e.g. petitions are often in writing, while begging/panhandling may be indicated by an action or even demeanor)]; (cf. pikci, te preti, te frati, se spuda, danfu)

column2:
'''cpina''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is pungent or irritating to observer  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo cpina''' — pungent, irritating. 
:'''i le sanso cu cpina''' — ''The sauce is hot.''
:'''i le panci cu cpina''' — ''The smell is irritating.''
:Related words: {vrusi}, {kukte}, {cidja}, {panci}, {sumne}
column16: is pungent or irritating to observer
column41: x1 is pungent/piquant/peppery/spicy/irritating to sense x2 ||| [also prickly (= pecycpina)]; (cf. vrusi, kukte, cidja, panci, sumne)

column2:
'''cradi''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  broadcasts or transmits  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  via station or frequency  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  to receiver  ''x<sub>4</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo cradi''' — broadcaster. '''lo se cradi''' — broadcasted. '''lo te cradi''' — broadcasting station. '''lo ve cradi''' — broadcast receiver. 
:'''i ti cradi lo vajni notci lo tordu boxna lo se bevri''' — ''This is a radio transmitter sending important messages on short waves to portable receivers.''
:Related words: {tivni}, {benji}, {tcana}
column7: x1 benji x2 noi se bacru ja zgike ja sance ku'o fu x3 fi x4 noi cabra lo ka cpacu
column41: x1 broadcasts/transmits [using radio waves] x2 via station/frequency x3 to [radio] receiver x4 ||| [also x1 is a broadcaster]; (cf. tivni, benji, tcana)

column2:
'''crane''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is in front of  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  facing  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo crane''' — something in front. 
:'''i pa tricu cu crane la alis la kevin''' — ''A tree is before (in front of) Alice from Kevin's position.''
:'''i pa tricu cu crane mi''' — ''A tree is in front of me.''
:'''i pa ctino cu pagre bu'u lo crane be le lunra''' — ''A shadow passed before the moon.''
:Related words: {sefta}, {flira}, {trixe}, {mlana}, {pritu}, {zunle}
column7: x1 ralju lo mlana be x2 .i x1 mlana x2 gi'e vasru lo flira be x2 .i x1 mlana x2 lo zgana be x2 .i x1 to'e trixe x2
column41: x1 is anterior/ahead/forward/(in/on) the front of x2 which faces/in-frame-of-reference x3 ||| [also: x3 is the standard of orientation for x2] (cf. sefta, flira, trixe, mlana, pritu, zunle)

column2:
'''creka''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a shirt ...
:'''lo creka''' — shirt. 
:'''i do poi dasni lo creka cu simlu lo ka stati''' — ''You look smart in the shirt.''
:Related words: {taxfu}
column7: x1 taxfu lo cutne .a lo cutne jo'u birka gi'e marji x2
column41: x1 is a shirt/blouse/top [upper-body garment - not necessarily sleeved or buttoned], material x2 ||| (cf. taxfu)

column2:
'''crepu''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  harvests, plucks  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(property of x3)</sub>''  from  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo crepu''' — harvester. '''lo se crepu''' — harvested crop. '''lo te crepu''' — crop field. 
:'''i ra crepu lo vanjba le purdi''' — ''She is harvesting grapes from the garden.''
:Related words: {lebna}, {vimcu}, {katna}, {critu}, {sombo}, {jmaji}
column41: x1 (agent) harvests/reaps/gathers crop/product/objects x2 from source/area x3 ||| (cf. critu, sombo, jmaji)

column2:
'''cribe''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a bear of species  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(taxon)</sub>'' 
:'''lo cribe''' — bear (animal). 
:'''i lo cribe cu se zdani lo vi boske''' — ''Bears live in this forest.''
:Related words: {danlu}, {mabru}
column7: x1 mabru x2 noi jutsi la'o jutsi. Ursidae .jutsi
column41: x1 is a bear/ursoid of species/breed x2 ||| (cf. danlu, mabru)

column2:
'''crida''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a fairy, elf, or other mythical humanoid ...
:'''lo crida''' — fairy, elf. 
:'''i mi pu cusku pa lisri be lo za'u crida''' — ''I told a story about fairies.''
:Related words: {ranmi}, {lijda}
column7: x1 rarbancu ja ranmi remsmi
column16: is a fairy, elf, or other mythical humanoid
column41: x1 is a fairy/elf/gnome/brownie/pixie/goblin/kobold [mythical humanoid] of mythos/religion x2 ||| [also orc, giant, demon or devil (when humanoid-form is presumed by the mythos/religion), bugbear, bogeyman]; (cf. ranmi, especially for non-humanoid creatures of myth, lijda)

column2:
'''crino''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is green
:'''lo crino''' — green. 
:'''i ca lo crisa lo pezli poi crino co'a xunre''' — ''In the fall leaves that are green, turn red.''
:Related words: {skari}, {blabi}, {xekri}, {kandi}, {carmi}, {cicna}
column7: x1 skari lo'e banro je vifne srasu .a lo'e gusni poi jbini lo'e blanu ku joi lo'e pelxu le ka boxna clani
column41: x1 is green/verdant [color adjective] ||| (cf. skari, blabi, xekri, kandi, carmi, cicna)

column2:
'''crisa''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is summer of year  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  at location  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo crisa''' — summer. 
:'''i ca crisa lo re no no mu moi be lo nanca ti''' — ''Now it's summer of year 2005 at my place.''
:Related words: {citsi}, {critu}, {dunra}, {vensa}
column7: x1 citsi lo ka glare kei x2 tu'i x3 gi'e se lidne lo vensa gi'e lidne lo critu
column41: x1 is summer/summertime [hot season] of year x2 at location x3 ||| (cf. citsi, critu, dunra, vensa)

column2:
'''critu''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is autumn of year  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  at location  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo critu''' — autumn. 
:'''i xu ca critu lo re no no mu moi be lo nanca do''' — ''Is it now autumn of year 2005 at your place?''
:Related words: {citsi}, {crisa}, {dunra}, {vensa}, {crepu}
column7: x1 citsi lo ka lekyze'a kei x2 tu'i x3 gi'e se lidne lo crisa gi'e lidne lo dunra
column41: x1 is autumn/fall [harvest/cooling season] of year x2 at location x3 ||| (cf. citsi, crisa, dunra, vensa, crepu)

column2:
'''ctaru''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a tide in  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  ...
:'''lo ctaru''' — tide. 
:'''i lo ctaru be lo xamsi cu barda''' — ''The tide in the sea is high.''
:Related words: {xamsi}
column7: x1 nu lo sefta be x2 noi xamsi cu dikni zenba jo'u jdika lo ni galtu
column41: x1 is a tide [cyclical/periodic expansion] in x2 caused by x3 ||| (cf. xamsi)

column2:
'''ctebi''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a lip of orifice  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  ...
:'''lo ctebi''' — lip. '''lo se ctebi''' — orifice with a lip. 
:'''i lo se dekpu be lo ctebi be le vlagi cu banzu lo nu lo panzi cu pagre''' — ''The size of the hole of the vagina is enough for the child to pass.''
:Related words: {moklu}, {korbi}, {cinba}
column3: -x1 is a/the lip [body-part]/rim of orifice x2 of body x3; (adjective:) x1 is labial.
column4: _+x1 is a/the lip [body-part]/rim of orifice x2 of body x3.
column41: x1 is a/the lip [body-part]/rim of orifice x2 of body x3; (adjective:) x1 is labial ||| (cf. moklu, korbi, cinba)

column2:
'''cteki''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(property of x3)</sub>''  is a tax on  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(property of x3)</sub>''  levied against  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  by authority or collector  ''x<sub>4</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo cteki''' — tax. '''lo se cteki''' — taxable property. '''lo te cteki''' — taxpayer. '''lo ve cteki''' — collector of a tax. 
:'''i lo prenu pu na nelci lo noi cnino vau cteki be lo ka ralte lo bakni bei ro lo xabju bei loi turni''' — ''People didn't like the new tax on keeping cows levied against everyone by the government.''
:'''i lo rupnu be li re mu cu cteki lo ka ralte lo bakni''' — ''25 dollars is the tax for keeping cows.''
:Related words: {pleji}, {flalu}, {turni}
column41: x1 is a tax/levy/duty on goods/services/event x2 levied against x3 by authority/collector x4 ||| [also custom, toll, tariff, tribute] (cf. pleji, flalu, turni)

column2:
'''ctile''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is some petroleum ...
:'''lo ctile''' — petroleum. 
:'''i ti minji lo nu cokcu lo ctile''' — ''This is a machine for pumping out oil.''
:Related words: {grasu}
column41: x1 is a quantity of petroleum/oil from source x2 ||| (cf. grasu)

column2:
'''ctino''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a shadow of  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  made by light source  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo ctino''' — shadow. 
:'''i mi pu terpa tu'a lo ctino be lo tricu bei le lunra''' — ''I was afraid of shadows of trees in moonlight.''
:Related words: {manku}, {gusni}
column7: x1 manku se ja'e lo nu x2 se ragve x3 x1 gi'e fanta lo nu x3 te gusni x1
column41: x1 is a shadow/the shade of object x2, made by light/energy source x3 ||| (cf. manku, gusni)

column2:
'''ctuca''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  teaches to  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  ideas or method  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(property of x2)</sub>''  ...
:'''lo ctuca''' — teacher. '''lo se ctuca''' — taught audience. '''lo te ctuca''' — subject taught. 
:'''i le prenu pu ctuca mi'a lo traji tasmi be lo nu tavla fo la lojban''' — ''The person taught us the best style of speaking Lojban.''
:'''i le mamta cu ctuca le verba le du'u lo nu cladu tavla na se clite''' — ''The mother taught the child that talking loud isn't polite.''
:'''i le laldo pu ctuca mi lo tadji be lo nu na ganse lo ka cortu''' — ''The old one taught me the method of not feeling the pain.''
:Related words: {ckule}, {cilre}, {tadni}
column5: _-Also instruct, instructor, educate, educator, teacher, professor, pedagogue; (adjective:) x1/x5 is pedagogical. See also {ckule}, {cilre}, {tadni}.
column6: _+Also instruct, instructor, educate, educator, teacher, professor, pedagogue. See also {ckule}, {cilre}, {tadni}.
column7: x1 troci lo ka gasnu lo nu x2 cilre x3 x4 kei kei x5
column41: x1 teaches audience x2 ideas/methods/lore x3 (du'u) about subject(s) x4 by method x5 (event) ||| [also instruct, instructor, educate, educator, teacher, professor, pedagogue; (adjective:) x1/x5 is pedagogical]; (cf. ckule, cilre, tadni)

column2:
'''cukla''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is round
:'''lo cukla''' — round. 
:'''i le lunra noi pelxu gi'e cukla gi'e carmi cu zvati lo tsani''' — ''The Moon, yellow, round and bright, is in the sky.''
:Related words: {djine}, {ranji}, {bolci}, {tarmi}
column7: x1 se cimde re da ije lo jimte be x1 cu manfo lo ka ce'u sepli lo midju be x1 makau
column41: x1 is round/circular [2-dimensional shape/form]; x1 is a disk/circle/ring ||| [normally used for a filled-in circle/disk, but emphasis on roundness means that the concept may include 'ring']; (cf. djine, ranji, bolci, tarmi)

column2:
'''cukta''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a book with work  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  ...
:'''lo cukta''' — book. '''lo se cukta''' — work in a book. 
:'''i mi tcidu fi pa cukta be lo cinri''' — ''I read a book with an interesting content (an interesting book).''
:Related words: {cfika}, {prina}, {prosa}, {tcidu}, {papri}
column7: x1 se papri lo vasru be x2 noi se finti x3
column41: x1 is a book containing work x2 by author x3 for audience x4 preserved in medium x5 ||| [x1 is a manifestation/container [a physical object or its analogue] of a work/content, not necessarily using paper (= selpapri)]; (cf. cfika, prina, prosa, tcidu, papri)

column2:
'''culno''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is full of  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo culno''' — full. 
:'''i le lanka cu culno lo pelji''' — ''The basket is full of paper.''
:Related words: {tisna}, {kunti}, {mulno}, {setca}, {tisna}
column7: x1 vasru x2 ja'e lo nu x1 na kakne lo ka vasru lo drata be x2 .i x1 to'e kunti x2
column41: x1 is full/completely filled with x2 ||| (cf. tisna, kunti, mulno, setca, tisna)

column2:
'''cumki''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(clause)</sub>''  is possible ...
:'''lo cumki''' — possible. 
:'''i cumki fa lo nu la alis ba jai lerci''' — ''It's possible that Alice will be late.''
:Related words: {lakne}
column7: x1 ka'e fasnu .i x1 su'o cu'o .i x1 la'erlai li za'u no
column41: x1 (event/state/property) is possible under conditions x2; x1 may/might occur; x1 is a maybe ||| [also possibility]; (cf. lakne, cumki)

column2:
'''cumla''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is modest or humble about  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(property of x1)</sub>'' 
:'''lo cumla''' — modest. 
:'''i mi'ai pu cumla lo ka kanpe ma kau''' — ''We were modest in our expectations.''
:Related words: {cinmo}, {jgira}
column41: x1 is humble/modest about x2 (abstraction); x1 displays humility about x2 ||| (cf. cinmo, jgira)

column2:
'''cunmi''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is some millet or grain of species  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(taxon)</sub>'' 
:'''lo cunmi''' — millet. 
:'''i lo jipci cu citka lo cunmi''' — ''Hens eat millet.''
:Related words: {gurni}
column7: x1 gurni ja spati x2 noi jutsi la'o jutsi Setaria italica jutsi
column16: is some millet or grain of species
column41: x1 is a quantity of millet [grain] of species/strain x2 ||| (cf. gurni)

column2:
'''cunso''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(clause)</sub>''  is random, unpredictable ...
:'''lo cunso''' — random. 
:'''i lo nu ca ma kau le prenu cu tsuku pu cunso''' — ''When would he come was unpredictable.''
:Related words: {cnici}, {lakne}, {funca}, {kalsa}, {snuti}
column7: x1 se morna no da .i x1 kalsa lo ka se stura ma kau
column41: x1 is random/fortuitous/unpredictable under conditions x2, with probability distribution x3 ||| [also accidental, chancy, by chance, adventitious, arbitrary (also = cuncu'a, cunselcu'a, cunjdi, cunseljdi; based on "unpredictable")]; (cf. cnici, lakne, funca, kalsa, snuti)

column2:
'''cuntu''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(clause)</sub>''  is an affair or organized activity involving persons  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo cuntu''' — affair, business (activity). 
:'''i ra pu se cuntu lo zekri''' — ''He was involved in a crime.''
:Related words: {jikca}, {srana}
column3: -x1 is an affair/organized activity involving person(s) x2 (ind./mass); x1 is x2's business.
column4: _+x1 is an affair/organized activity involving person(s) x2; x1 is x2's business.
column7: x1 se fuzme ja cinri x2 gi'e jai se kanpe fai lo ka x2 jundi ja kurji ce'u gi'a zukte lo srana be ce'u
column16: is an affair or organized activity involving persons
column41: x1 is an affair/organized activity involving person(s) x2 (ind./mass); x1 is x2's business ||| [also matter, concern; x2 is engaged in x1 (which is usually an abstraction) (= selcu'u for reordered places)] (cf. jikca, srana)

column2:
'''cupra''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  produces product  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  by process  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(property of x1)</sub>'' 
:'''lo cupra''' — producer, origin, source. '''lo se cupra''' — product. '''lo te cupra''' — process of production. 
:'''i lo karce cu cupra lo nejni lo ka jai gau jelca lo livla''' — ''Car produces energy by burning fuel.''
:'''i lo tricu cu se cupra lo grute''' — ''Trees come from fruits.''
:Related words: {zbasu}, {farvi}, {gundi}, {jukpa}, {genja}, {jicmu}
column7: x1 gasnu ja se jalge lo nu x2 zasti
column41: x1 produces x2 [product] by process x3 ||| (cf. zbasu, farvi, gundi, jukpa)

column2:
'''curnu''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a worm of species  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(taxon)</sub>'' 
:'''lo curnu''' — worm. 
:'''i le cipni mo'u kavbu lo curnu''' — ''The bird caught a worm.''
:Related words: {since}, {silka}
column41: x1 is a worm/invertebrate animal of species/breed x2 ||| [also mollusk, snail (= cakcurnu), shellfish (= xaskemcakcurnu, xaskemcakydja); the generalization to invertebrate is because almost all multicellular invertebrates are indeed wormlike]; (cf. since, silka)

column2:
'''curve''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is pure in  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(property of x1)</sub>'' 
:'''lo curve''' — pure. 
:'''i ti noi djine cu curve lo ka solji''' — ''This ring is of pure gold.''
:Related words: {prane}, {jinsa}, {manfo}, {sampu}, {sepli}, {traji}, {lumci}, {xukmi}
column41: x1 is pure/unadulterated/unmitigated/simple in property x2 (ka) ||| [x1 is simply/purely/unmitigatedly/solely x2]; (cf. prane, jinsa, manfo, sampu, sepli, traji, lumci, xukmi)

column2:
'''cusku''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  says  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(text)</sub>''  for audience  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  ...
:'''lo cusku''' — who says. '''lo se cusku''' — what is said. '''lo te cusku''' — audience. 
:'''i ba bo mi pu cusku fi le ninmu fe lu do mutce xendo li'u''' — ''And then I said to the woman "You are very kind."''
:'''i do pu cusku lo se du'u do ba katna lo nanba''' — ''You said that you would cut the bread.''
:Comment: {skicu} is @@@to tell@@@, {cusku} is @@@to say@@@, {tavla} is @@@to talk@@@, {cusku} {lo} {notci} is @@@to notify@@@.
:Related words: {retsku}, {spusku}, {spuda}, {cu'u}, {bacru}, {tavla}, {casnu}, {bangu}, {dapma}, {jufra}, {pinka}
column7: x1 benji x2 noi valsi porsi ku'o x3 fu x4
column25: {skicu} is @@@to tell@@@, {cusku} is @@@to say@@@, {tavla} is @@@to talk@@@, {cusku} {lo} {notci} is @@@to notify@@@.
column41: x1 (agent) expresses/says x2 (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) for audience x3 via expressive medium x4 ||| [also says]; (cf. bacru, tavla, casnu, spuda, cmavo list cu'u, bangu, dapma, jufra, pinka)

column2:
'''smusku''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  says  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(clause)</sub>''  for audience  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo smusku''' — who says. '''lo te smusku''' — audience. 
:'''i la jasmin pu smusku lo jitfa do''' — ''Jasmine lied to you.''
:'''i la kevin pu smusku lo nu do nitcu lo nu mi sidju do''' — ''Kevin said that you need my help.''
:Comment: x<sub>2</sub> is a clause, not a quote (unlike {cusku})
:Related words: {cusku}, {retsku}, {spusku}, {spuda}, {cu'u}, {bacru}, {tavla}, {casnu}, {bangu}, {dapma}, {jufra}, {pinka}
column7: x1 zukte x4 lo nu x3 djuno lo du'u x1 xusra x2
column25: x<sub>2</sub> is a clause, not a quote (unlike {cusku})

column2:
'''spusku''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  responds with x2  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(text)</sub>''  to  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo spusku''' — responder. '''lo se spusku''' — reply, response, answer. 
:'''i au la jasmin ba spusku zo je'u mi''' — ''I wish Jasmine replies "Yes" to me.''
:Related words: {cusku}, {spuda}, {bacru}, {tavla}, {casnu}, {cu'u}, {bangu}, {dapma}, {jufra}, {pinka}
column7: x1 cusku x2 boi x3 boi x4 .i x1 spuda x3 lo nu go'i

column2:
'''retsku''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  makes a question x2  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(text)</sub>''  to  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo retsku''' — asker. '''lo se retsku''' — question. 
:'''i le nixli pu retsku fi pa pulji fe lu ta'i ma klama la palma noi xotli li'u''' — ''The girl asked a police officer "How does one get to Palm hotel?"''
:Comment: alternatively one can say {cusku} {lo} {preti} - @@@ask a question@@@.
:Related words: {cusku}, {preti}, {spusku}, {pinka}, {spuda}, {bacru}, {tavla}, {casnu}, {cu'u}, {bangu}, {dapma}, {jufra}
column7: x1 cusku x2 noi preti x3 boi x1 boi x4 ku'o x4 boi x5
column25: alternatively one can say {cusku} {lo} {preti} - @@@ask a question@@@.

column2:
'''cutci''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a shoe for covering  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  ...
:'''lo cutci''' — shoe. 
:'''i ti noi prenu cu zbasu lo cutci be lo sufti''' — ''This person makes horseshoes.''
:Related words: {smoka}, {taxfu}, {skiji}
column7: x1 taxfu lo ka jamfu ku gi'e selpau lo sirji senta be lo jdari be'o poi ke'a ca lo nu x1 vasru lo jamfu cu bitmu ri lo cnita be ri xoi bandu ri lo ka mu'a se xrani
column41: x1 is a shoe/boot/sandal for covering/protecting [feet/hooves] x2, and of material x3 ||| [also boot (= tupcutci)]; (cf. smoka, taxfu, skiji)

column2:
'''cutne''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is the chest of body  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo cutne''' — chest. 
:'''i le nanla pu ca'o jgari lo gerku re'o lo cutne''' — ''The boy was holding the dog near the chest.''
:Related words: {cnebo}, {betfu}, {xadni}, {tanxe}
column7: x1 pagbu lo xadni be x2 gi'e tersei lo cnebo lo betfu gi'e vasru lo bongu se sruri kevna poi se zvati lo risna jo'u lo fepri jo'u lo drata
column41: x1 is a/the chest/thorax/upper trunk/[rib cage/breast] [body-part] of x2 ||| (cf. cnebo, betfu, xadni, tanxe)

column2:
'''cuxna''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  chooses, decides on  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(property of x1)</sub>''  from complete set  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(group of same type as x2)</sub>'' 
:'''lo se cuxna''' — what is chosen. '''lo te cuxna''' — set of choices, menu of choices. 
:'''i mi nu'o mo'u cuxna lo ka zukte ma kau''' — ''I haven't yet decided what to do.''
:'''i nandu fa lo ka cuxna''' — ''It's hard to choose.''
:'''i mi pu cuxna la alis lo nixli''' — ''I chose Alice from the girls.''
:'''i la alis pu cuxna lo blanu lo taxfu''' — ''Alice chose the blue dress out of all.''
:'''i mi pensi cuxna lo nu mi citka ma kau''' — ''I'm thinking about what to eat.''
:Comment: {pajni} is for judging matters, {jdice} is for actual decisions, {cuxna} is for deciding (choosing) on something out of options.
:Related words: {jdice}, {pajni}, {nelci}
column3: -x1 chooses/selects x2 [choice] from set/sequence of alternatives x3 (complete set).
column4: _+x1 chooses/selects x2 [choice] from alternatives x3 (completely specified).
column7: x1 jdice lo du'u x2 traji lo ka se nelci ja se zanru x1 gi'a mapti kei x3
column25: {pajni} is for judging matters, {jdice} is for actual decisions, {cuxna} is for deciding (choosing) on something out of options.
column28: set of choices, menu of choices
column34: group of same type as x2
column41: x1 chooses/selects x2 [choice] from set/sequence of alternatives x3 (complete set) ||| [also prefer (= nelcu'a)]; (cf. jdice, pajni, nelci)

column2:
'''dacru''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a drawer in  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  ...
:'''lo dacru''' — drawer. 
:'''i pa junla ca cpana lo se dacru be lo barda''' — ''A clock stands on a chest of big drawers.''
:Related words: {nilce}, {tanxe}
column41: x1 is a drawer/file in structure x2, a [sliding compartment] container for contents x3 ||| (cf. nilce, tanxe)

column2:
'''dacti''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a thing, a material object enduring in space-time
:'''lo dacti''' — material object. 
:'''i tu noi dacti cu mo''' — ''What is that object over there?''
:Related words: {marji}, {xanri}
column7: x1 marji je se canlu je se ditcu
column16: is a thing, a material object enduring in space-time
column41: x1 is a material object enduring in space-time; x1 is a thing ||| (cf. marji, xanri)

column2:
'''dadjo''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is Taoist in  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(property of x1)</sub>'' 
:'''lo dadjo''' — Taoist. 
:'''i le tcaci cu dadjo''' — ''The tradition is Taoist.''
:Related words: {lijda}, {jegvo}
column41: x1 pertains to the Taoist culture/ethos/religion in aspect x2 ||| (cf. lijda, jegvo)

column2:
'''dakfu''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a knife for cutting  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  ...
:'''lo dakfu''' — knife. 
:'''i ti dakfu lo nanba''' — ''This is a knife for cutting bread.''
:Related words: {denci}, {balre}, {katna}, {tunta}, {forca}, {smuci}, {kinli}
column41: x1 is a knife (tool) for cutting x2, with blade of material x3 ||| (cf. denci, balre, katna, tunta, forca, smuci, kinli)

column2:
'''dakli''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a bag or sack containing  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  ...
:'''lo dakli''' — bag. '''lo se dakli''' — contents of a bag. 
:'''i mi ba bevri pa dakli be lo tamca lo nenri''' — ''I will take a bag of tomatoes inside.''
:Comment: @@@pouch@@@ is {lo} {daski}.
:Related words: {daski}, {bakfu}

column16: is a bag or sack containing
column25: @@@pouch@@@ is {lo} {daski}.
column41: x1 is a sack/bag with contents x2, and of material x3 ||| (cf. daski for pouch, bakfu)

column2:
'''damba''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  fights or struggles with  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  over issue  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(clause)</sub>'' 
:'''lo damba''' — fighter. 
:'''i mi pu damba lo mensi be mi le du'u ma kau klama ka'ai loi rirni''' — ''I fought with my sister of who would go with parents.''
:Comment: war ({lo} {nu} {jamna}) usually consists of battles ({lo} {nu} {damba}).
:Related words: {bradi}, {gunta}, {talsa}, {darlu}, {fapro}, {jamna}, {sonci}
column7: x1 fapro x2 x3 fau lo nu x1 gunta ja bandu x2
column25: war ({lo} {nu} {jamna}) usually consists of battles ({lo} {nu} {damba}).
column41: x1 fights/combats/struggles with x2 over issue x3 (abstract); x1 is a fighter/combatant ||| [use x3 tu'a for fight over an object/objective]; (cf. bradi, gunta, talsa, darlu, fapro, jamna, sonci)

column2:
'''damri''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a drum, gong or other percussion instrument with beater  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo damri''' — drum. '''lo se damri''' — beater of a drum. 
:'''i le nakni pu zgipli pa damri be lo xance''' — ''He was playing a hand struck drum.''
:Related words: {rilti}, {zgike}

column16: is a drum, gong or other percussion instrument with beater
column41: x1 is a drum/cymbal/gong [percussion musical instrument] with beater/actuator x2 ||| (cf. rilti, zgike)

column2:
'''damva'u''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  smokes, inhales smoke  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo damva'u''' — smoker. 
:'''i le prenu cu damva'u lo se panci be lo mabla''' — ''The person smokes something that has a shitty smell.''
:Related words: {danmo}, {vasxu}

column41: x1 hangs/dangles/is suspended from x2 by/at/with joint x3 ||| [pendant (= dadja'i); also dependent (original meaning)] (cf. lasna, jorne)

column2:
'''danfu''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is the answer or solution to question or problem  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(clause)</sub>'' 
:'''lo danfu''' — solution to a problem. '''lo se danfu''' — problem. 
:'''i lo ka pilno lo drata ckiku cu danfu lo tadji be lo ka jai gau karli fai le vorme''' — ''Using another key is the answer to the problem of opening the door.''
:Comment: {spuda} is for agentive response/reply.
:Related words: {ciksi}, {retsku}, {nabmi}, {spuda}, {cpedu}
column7: x1 mapti x2 noi preti ja nabmi ku'o lo ka fapro
column16: is the answer or solution to question or problem
column25: {spuda} is for agentive response/reply.
column41: x1 is the answer/response/solution/[reply] to question/problem x2 ||| (cf. ciksi, frati, preti, nabmi, spuda for agentive response/reply, cpedu)

column2:
'''danlu''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is an animal of species  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(taxon)</sub>'' 
:'''lo danlu''' — animal, creature. 
:'''i mi pu viska pa danlu bu'u le boske i le danlu cu jutsi ma''' — ''I saw an animal in the forest. What species does it belong to?''
:Related words: {banfi}, {cinki}, {cipni}, {finpe}, {ankabuta}, {respa}, {since}, {mabru}, {bakni}
column7: x1 jmive gi'e sorselsle gi'e ka'e ganse gi'e ka'e zukte lo ka ce'u muvdu kei gi'e jutsi x2
column41: x1 is an animal/creature of species x2; x1 is biologically animate ||| (cf. banfi, cinki, cipni, finpe, jukni, respa, since, mabru, bakni)

column2:
'''danmo''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is smoke from source  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''

:'''i lo danmo be lo noi ca'o jelca vau tricu co'a denmi''' — ''The smoke from the burning trees is becoming dense.''

column41: x1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of smoke/smog/air pollution from source x2 ||| [x2 may be a fire]; (cf. pulce, gapci, sigja, bumru)

:'''lo danti''' — bullet. '''lo se danti''' — gun.

'''daplu''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is an island ...
:'''lo daplu''' — island.

column2:
'''dapma''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  wishes to  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  luck or fate  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(property of x2)</sub>'' 
:'''lo se dapma''' — condemned. 
:'''i mi pu dapma le fetsi lo ka se funca lo zabna''' — ''I wished her good luck.''
:'''i le monsuta pu dapma le virnu lo ka ba zi morsi''' — ''The monster cursed the brave person to die soon.''
:Comment: can describe any type of fate: good luck or bad luck (@@@to condemn@@@, @@@to curse@@@).
:Related words: {mabla}, {dimna}, {cnemu}, {sfasa}, {dunda}, {cusku}, {cirko}, {jdima}, {di'ai}
column7: x1 gasnu ja djisku lo nu x2 se dimna x3 noi mabla

column41: x1 curses/damns/condemns x2 to fate (event) x3 ||| [curse with a specific expression (= dapsku)]; (cf. mabla, dimna, cnemu, sfasa, dunda, cusku, cirko, jdima)

'''dargu''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a road or highway ...

column41: x1 is a road/highway to x2 from x3 with route x4 (x2/x3 may be unordered) ||| [a regularly used, improved-for-use surface for travelling]; (cf. naxle, tcana, pluta, klaji)

column2:
'''darlu''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  argues for stance  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(proposition)</sub>''  against stance  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(proposition)</sub>'' 
:'''lo se darlu''' — stance (in a discussion). 
:'''i loi enge pu darlu lo nu le dargu cu se stuzi lo berti vau lo nu le dinju cu se zbasu fi lo rokci''' — ''Engineers argued for the road to be located to the north and against the house to be built of rock.''
:Comment: opponent is not necessary.
:Related words: {fapro}, {jamna}, {sarji}, {talsa}, {sumti}, {tugni}, {casnu}, {damba}, {bradi}, {tavla}
column7: x1 sabji lo krinu be lo nu jinvi x2 .e nai x3
column25: opponent is not necessary.
column41: x1 argues for stand x2 against stand x3; [an opponent is not necessary] ||| (cf. fapro, jamna, sarji, talsa, sumti, tugni, casnu, damba, bradi, tavla)

:'''lo darno''' — distant. 
:'''i le muzga cu darno ti''' — ''The museum is far from here.''
:'''i lo jungo bangu cu darno lo glico bangu lo ka va'o ce'u ma kau tarmi lo nu bacru''' — ''Chinese language is far from English in the manner of pronunciation.''

column7: x1 sepli x2 lo barda be x3 .i x1  to'e jibni x2 x3
column41: x1 is far/distant from x2 in property x3 (ka) ||| (cf. jibni)

'''darsi''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  shows audacity in behavior  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(property of x1)</sub>'' 
:'''lo darsi''' — cheeky. '''lo se darsi''' — audacious behaviour. 
:'''i la edvard ca darsi lo ka na cusku lo jetnu la tom''' — ''Eduard dares not tell Tom the truth.''
:Related words: {virnu}
column41: x1 shows audacity/chutzpah in behavior x2 (event/activity); x1 dares to do/be x2 (event/ka) ||| [x1 is bold]; (cf. virnu)

column2:
'''darxi''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  hits or strikes  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  ...
:'''lo darxi''' — who strikes. '''lo se darxi''' — struck, stricken. 
:'''i mi pu darxi lo xedja be le nakni se pi'o lo xance''' — ''I hit his jaw with hand.''
:'''i mi pu darxi la alis se pi'o lo zunle jamfu be mi re'o lo betfu''' — ''I kicked Alice with my left foot in the belly.''
:Related words: {bikla}, {gunta}, {jenca}, {tunta}, {janli}, {jgari}, {pencu}

column41: x1 hits/strikes/[beats] x2 with instrument [or body-part] x3 at locus x4 ||| (cf. bikla, gunta, jenca, tunta, tikpa, janli, jgari, pencu)

column2:
'''daski''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a pocket or pouch in  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo daski''' — pocket. 
:'''i mi pu punji lo xance be mi lo daski be lo kosta pe mi''' — ''I put my hand into the pocket of my coat.''
:Related words: {dakli}, {taxfu}, {bakfu}
column16: is a pocket or pouch in
column41: x1 is a pocket/pouch of/in garment/item x2 ||| (cf. dakli, taxfu, bakfu)

column2:
'''dasni''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  wears  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  as garment of type  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(property of x1)</sub>'' 
:'''lo dasni''' — who wears a garment. '''lo se dasni''' — garment worn. 
:'''i e'o do co'a dasni lo cutci''' — ''Please put on your shoes.''
:'''i le nixli cu dasni lo creka lo skaci''' — ''The girl wears a shirt as a skirt.''

:'''lo daspo''' — destroyer. '''lo se daspo''' — destroyed. 
:'''i ra pu daspo lo ka kanro''' — ''He ruined his health.''
:'''i lo fagri pu daspo ci me lo dinju''' — ''The fire destroyed three of the buildings.''
:Related words: {spofu}, {xrani}, {marxa}, {zalvi}, {xaksu}

column41: x1 (event) destroys/ruins/wrecks/despoils x2; x1 is destructive ||| (cf. spofu, xrani, marxa, zalvi, xaksu)

column2:
'''dasri''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a ribbon ...
:'''lo dasri''' — ribbon, strip. 
:'''i le jai se dunda pu se bakfu fi pa dasri''' — ''The gift was tied with a ribbon.''
:Related words: {djine}
column7: x1 clani je jarki je cinla je toltinsa marji x2

:'''lo datka''' — duck. 
:'''i so'o datka ru'i limna le lalxu''' — ''Several ducks are swimming in the lake.''
:Related words: {cipni}

column2:
'''datni''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(property of x2)</sub>''  is information about  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  gathered by method  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(property of x2)</sub>''

:'''i lo ka zukte lo zekri cu datni le nanmu lo ka zgana lo se zukte be ce'u''' — ''Being a criminal are the data about the man collected by monitoring his actions.''
:'''i ai mi tavla do lo datni be fi lo cipra''' — ''I'm going to talk to you about experimental data.''

column25: ? de'i eiliminated?

column2:
'''decti''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a tenth of  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(same type as x1)</sub>''  in  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(property of x1)</sub>''

column2:
'''degji''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a finger, toe, or digit on limb  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  ...
:'''lo degji''' — finger, toe, digit (of body). '''lo se degji''' — limb with fingers or toes. 
:'''i lo degji be lo pritu xance be mi cu cortu''' — ''The fingers of my right hand hurt.''
:Related words: {nazbi}, {tamji}, {tance}, {xance}
column16: is a finger, toe, or digit on limb

column2:
'''dejni''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  owes debt  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity, property of x1)</sub>''  to creditor  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  in return for service  ''x<sub>4</sub><sub>(entity, property of x1)</sub>'' 
:'''lo dejni''' — debtor. '''lo se dejni''' — debt. '''lo te dejni''' — creditor of debt. 
:'''i mi dejni lo ka sidju vau do lo ka se sidju do''' — ''I am obliged to help you in return for your help.''
:'''i mi dejni fi lo patfu be mi fo lo ka snada''' — ''I owe my success to my father.''
:Related words: {jbera}, {janta}, {zivle}
column41: x1 owes x2 in debt/obligation to creditor x3 in return for x4 [service, loan]; x1 is a debtor ||| (cf. jbera, janta, zivle)

column7: x1 klani x2 lo ni canlu kei ma'i x3
column41: x1 is x2 (default 1) local volume unit(s) [non-metric; e.g. bushel], standard x3, x4 subunits ||| [gallon (= likydekpu), quart (= likseldekpu), barrel (wet = likybradekpu, dry = sudbradekpu), bushel (= sudydekpu), peck (= sudyseldekpu), cupful (= kabrydekpu), tablespoon (= mucydekpu); teaspoon (= mucyseldekpu); (all of these lujvo may need gic- to distinguish the English measurement system in contrasting with some local system; the English system is otherwise presumed to be the default non-metric system)]; (additional subunit places may be added as x5, x6, ...); (cf. canlu, litce, rupnu, fepni, gutci, minli, merli, bunda, kramu)

column2:
'''dekto''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is ten of  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(same type as x1)</sub>''  in  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(property of x1)</sub>'' 
:'''lo dekto''' — 10_. 
:'''i le dinju cu dekto be lo mitre lo ka clani''' — ''The house is 10 meters high.''
:Related words: {centi}
column7: x1 klani li gei pa x2
column41: x1 is ten [10; 1*10**1] of x2 in dimension/aspect x3 (default is units) ||| (cf. grake, mitre, snidu, stero, delno, molro, kelvo, xampo, gradu. litce, merli, centi, decti, femti, gigdo, gocti, gotro, kilto, megdo, mikri, milti, nanvi, petso, picti, terto, xatsi, xecto, xexso, zepti, zetro)

column2:

:'''lo delfinu''' — dolphin. 
:'''i lo'e delfinu cu stati''' — ''Dolphins are generally smart.''
:Comment: see {mabru}, {xamsi}, {flu'ente}.
:Related words: {mabru}, {xamsi}, {rirxe}
column25: see {mabru}, {xamsi}, {flu'ente}.

column41: x1 is x2 candela [metric unit] in luminosity (default is 1) by standard x3 ||| (cf. centi, decti, dekto, femti, gigdo, gocti, gotro, kilto, megdo, mikri, milti, nanvi, petso, picti, terto, xatsi, xecto, xexso, zepti, zetro)

column2:
'''dembi''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a legume, bean, or pea from plant  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo dembi''' — legume seed. '''lo se dembi''' — plant with legumes. 
:'''i mi ca ca'o citka lo stasu be lo dembi''' — ''I am eating a bean stew.''

column16: is a legume, bean, or pea from plant
column41: x1 is a bean/pea/leguminous seed from plant [legume] x2 ||| (cf. grute, sobde, tsiju)

column2:
'''denci''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a tooth of  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo denci''' — tooth. 
:'''i lo denci be mi cu cortu''' — ''I have a toothache.''
:Related words: {dakfu}, {pagre}, {jgalu}, {moklu}, {dakfu}, {pagre}, {jgalu}, {batci}, {bongu}

column2:
'''denmi''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is dense in  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(property of x1)</sub>''  ...
:'''lo denmi''' — dense.

column41: x1 is dense/concentrated/packed/intense in property x2 (ka) at location/locus x3 ||| (cf. carmi, midju, viknu)

column2:
'''denpa''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  waits or pauses for  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(clause)</sub>''  at state  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(property of x1)</sub>''  before doing  ''x<sub>4</sub><sub>(property of x1)</sub>'' 
:'''i ko ze'i denpa''' — ''Wait a bit. Just a moment!''
:'''i xu do pu denpa''' — ''Did you wait?''
:'''i mi denpa lo nu lo patfu cu volta vau lo ka kelci vau lo ka cliva''' — ''I am waiting for my father to arrive playing before leaving.''
:Related words: {dicra}, {fanmo}, {sisti}, {fliba}, {basna}
column7: x1 cando co'u lo nu x2 fasnu kei gi'e stali x3 co'u lo ka co'a ja di'a ckaji ja zukte x4

column2:
'''dertu''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is some soil or dirt ...
:'''lo dertu''' — soil, dirt, ground (soil), earth (soil). 
:'''i pu ze'a ku le karce cu muvdu bu'u lo dertu''' — ''For a while, the car moved on the soil.''

column41: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of dirt/soil/earth/ground from source x2 of composition x3 ||| [also: x1 is earthen; x3: composition including x3, which need not be exhaustive of composition]; (cf. kliti, terdi, loldi)

column2:

:'''lo derxi''' — heap.

column16: is a heap or stack of
column41: x1 is a heap/pile/stack/mound/hill of materials x2 at location x3 ||| (cf. cmana)

column2:
'''desku''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is shakes or vibrates from force  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(clause)</sub>'' 
:'''lo desku''' — something vibrating. 
:'''i ra pu desku lo ka terpa''' — ''She was shaking with fear.''
:Related words: {slilu}, {janbe}

column2:
'''detri''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(number)</sub>''  is the date of  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(clause)</sub>''  ...
:'''lo detri''' — datestamp. 
:'''i li ly pa dy pa ze ny re no pa xa detri lo nu mi co'a tadni la lojban''' — ''January 17, 2016 is the date when I started studying Lojban.''
:Comment: in x<sub>1</sub> {ny} is put before years, {ly} is put before months, {dy} is put before days, {cy} is put before hours, {my} is put before minutes, {sy} is put before seconds.
:Related words: {de'i}, {djedi}, {jeftu}, {masti}, {nanca}, {tcika}, {judri}
column5: _-(time units in x1 are specified as numbers separated by pi'e or are unit values massified with joi); See also cmavo list {de'i}, {djedi}, {jeftu}, {masti}, {nanca}, {tcika}.
column6: _+(time units in x1 are specified as numbers separated by pi'e); See also cmavo list {de'i}, {djedi}, {jeftu}, {masti}, {nanca}, {tcika}.
column7: x1 noi nanca jo'u masti jo'u djedi sinxa cu judri x2 noi fasnu kei x3
column25: in x<sub>1</sub> {ny} is put before years, {ly} is put before months, {dy} is put before days, {cy} is put before hours, {my} is put before minutes, {sy} is put before seconds.
column41: x1 is the date [day,{week},{month},year] of event/state x2, at location x3, by calendar x4 ||| (time units in x1 are specified as numbers separated by pi'e or are unit values massified with joi); (cf. cmavo list de'i, djedi, jeftu, masti, nanca, tcika)

column7: x1 jai se jalge lo nu x2 tolcfa kei fai x3
column41: x1 (event) interrupts/stops/halts/[disrupts] x2 (object/event/process) due to quality x3 ||| [also disturbs (one sense)]; (cf. zunti, fanza, raktu, denpa)

column16: deduces/reasons by deduction/establishes by deduction that

column2:
'''diklo''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is confined to location  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  within range  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo diklo''' — local. 
:'''i lo ca carvi cu diklo lo stuna lo bu'u tcadu''' — ''Within the borders of this city, the rain is in the south.''
:Related words: {bu'u}, {zvati}, {jibni}, {cpana}, {nenri}, {lamji}, {stuzi}, {tcila}
column7: x1 se stuzi x2 noi pagbu x3 gi'e se steci lo ka stuzi x1 kei lo pagbu be x3
column41: x1 is local to x2; x1 is confined to locus x2 within range x3 ||| [indicates a specific location/value within a range; e.g. a hits b.  What is the locality on b that a hits?  Thus x1 is associated with a specific narrow region/interval x2 of wider space/range x3]; (cf. cmavo list di'o, jibni, zvati, cpana, nenri, lamji, stuzi, tcila)

column2:
'''dikni''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is regular or periodic in  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(property of x1)</sub>''  with interval  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo dikni''' — regular. 
:'''i mi dikni lo ka lumci lo kumfa pe mi vau lo jeftu''' — ''I am regular in cleaning my room every week.''
:Related words: {slilu}, {rilti}, {xutla}, {manfo}, {boxna}
column7: lo nu x1 ckaji x2 cu rapli .i lo lamsi'u se krefu cu sepsi'u x3 .i x1 to'e vitci x2
column41: x1 is regular/cyclical/periodic in property (ka)/activity x2 with period/interval x3 ||| [also uniform; resonant (= dikslicai)]; (cf. slilu, rilti, xutla, manfo, boxna)

column2:
'''dilcu''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(number)</sub>''  is a quotient of  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(number)</sub>''  divided by  ''x<sub>3</sub><sub>(number)</sub>''  , leaving remainder  ''x<sub>4</sub><sub>(number)</sub>'' 
:'''lo dilcu''' — quotient. '''lo se dilcu''' — dividend of a quotient. '''lo te dilcu''' — divisor of a quotient. '''lo ve dilcu''' — remainder of a quotient. 
:'''i li re dilcu li pa ci li mu li ci''' — ''2 is the quotient of 13 divided by 5 with the remainder 3.''
:Related words: {frinu}, {fendi}, {katna}, {parbi}, {mekso}
column7: x1 te fatri x3 boi x2 .i x1 nu'a fe'i x2 boi x3
column41: x1 is a quotient of 'x2/x3' [dividend x2 divided by divisor x3], leaving remainder x4 ||| (cf. frinu, fendi, katna, parbi, mekso)

column2:
'''dilnu''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a cloud of material  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  ...
:'''lo dilnu''' — cloud. 
:'''i le cmana cu cupra lo dilnu be lo danmo''' — ''The mountain produces clouds of smoke.''

column41: x1 is a fate/destiny of x2; [doom, curse are mabla-forms]; x2 is fated/predestined/doomed to x1 ||| [fated/destined/doomed (= seldimna)]; (cf. dapma)

column2:
'''dinju''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a house, building for purpose  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(property of x1)</sub>'' 
:'''lo dinju''' — house, building. 
:'''i ti dinju lo nu lumci''' — ''This is a bathhouse.''

column41: x1 is a building/edifice for purpose x2 ||| (cf. ginka, zdani, zarci)

column2:
'''dinko''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a nail or tack for purpose  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  ...
:'''lo dinko''' — nail (tack). 
:'''i mi pu lasna le pixra le bitmu pa dinko se pi'o pa mruli''' — ''I nailed the picture to the wall using a hammer.''
:'''i ti dinko lo ka lasna lo cutci lo xirma ce'u''' — ''This is a nail for fastening horseshoes.''

column2:
'''dirba''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity, property of x2)</sub>''  is dear, precious to  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' 
:'''lo dirba''' — precious, dear (of great value). 
:'''i do pu zvati ma doi lo dirba''' — ''Where have you been, dear?''
:'''i lo nu jmive cu dirba ro da''' — ''Life is dear to everybody.''
:Related words: {tcika}, {kargu}, {vamji}, {vajni}, {pleji}, {jadni}, {jemna}
column5: _-x1 may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= posydirba for unambiguous {semantics}). See also {tcika}, {kargu}, {vamji}, {vajni}, {pleji}, {jadni}, {jemna}.
column6: _+x1 may be a specific object, a commodity, an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= posydirba for unambiguous {semantics}). See also {tcika}, {kargu}, {vamji}, {vajni}, {pleji}, {jadni}, {jemna}.
column41: x1 is dear/precious/darling to x2; x1 is emotionally valued by x2 ||| [x1 may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= posydirba for unambiguous semantics)]; (cf. tcika, kargu, vamji, vajni, pleji, jadni, jemna)

:'''i le jinto cu dirce lo djacu''' — ''The spring of fluid emits water.''

column7: x1 benji x2 zi'o zi'o zi'o .i x1 gasnu lo nu x2 cliva x1
column41: x1 radiates/emits x2 under conditions x3 ||| (cf. gusni)

column2:
'''dirgo''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is a drop of  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  ...
:'''lo dirgo''' — drop. 
:'''i sa'u ti dirgo lo djacu''' — ''It's just a drop of water.''
:Related words: {daplu}, {bidju}
column41: x1 is a drop [small, cohesive shape] of material [liquid/vapor] x2 in surrounding material x3 ||| (cf. daplu, bidju)

column2:
'''ditcu''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(clause)</sub>''  is the time-duration/period of  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(clause)</sub>'' 
:'''lo ditcu''' — period. 
:'''i ma ditcu lo nu do limna le rirxe''' — ''How long have you been swimming in the river?''
:Related words: {cedra}, {ranji}, {tcika}, {renvi}, {temci}, {canlu}, {kuspe}

'''dizlo''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is low compared to  ''x<sub>2</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>'' <sub>(entity)</sub>'' ; x<sub>1</sub> is a lower part of x<sub>2</sub> ...
:'''lo dizlo''' — low, bottom. 
:'''i le gerku cu dizlo le mlatu poi cpare le tricu''' — ''The dog stands low compared to the cat climbing the tree.''
:'''i mi mo'u farlu lo dizlo be le bitmu''' — ''I fell down to the foot of the fence.''
:Related words: {cnita}, {galtu}, {gapru}, {farna}, {loldi}
column7: x1 toltce lo ka gapru x2 .i x1 to'e galtu x2
column24: x<sub>1</sub> is a lower part of x<sub>2</sub>
column41: x1 is low/down/downward in frame of reference x2 as compared with baseline/standard height x3 ||| [also lower; x3 is generally some defined distance above a zero point/baseline, or is that baseline itself]; (cf. cnita, galtu, gapru, farna, loldi)

column2:
'''djacu''' — ''x<sub>1</sub><sub>(entity)</sub>''  is some water
:'''lo djacu''' — water. 
:'''i le nakni pu pinxe lo djacu pa kabri''' — ''He drank some water from a cup.''
:Related words: {lalxu}, {rirxe}, {xamsi}, {limna}, {litki}, {lumci}, {bumru}, {jinto}
column3: -x1 is made of/contains/is a quantity/expanse of water; (adjective:) x1 is aqueous/[aquatic].
column4: _+x1 is made of/contains/is a quantity/expanse of water.
